 1: <?php
 2: 
 3: namespace Instagram\Entities;
 4: 
 5: use Instagram\Http\Response;
 6: 
 7: /**
 8:  * Media
 9:  *
10:  * @package    Instagram
11:  * @author     Hassan Khan <contact@hassankhan.me>
12:  * @link       https://github.com/hassankhan/instagram-sdk
13:  * @license    MIT
14:  */
15: class Media extends AbstractEntity
16: {
17:     /**
18:      * Retrieves information for a media object with `$id`.
19:      *
20:      * @param string $id
21:      *
22:      * @return Response
23:      *
24:      * @link https://www.instagram.com/developer/endpoints/media/#get_media
25:      */
26:     public function get($id)
27:     {
28:         return $this->client->request('GET', "media/$id");
29:     }
30: 
31:     /**
32:      * Retrieves information for a media object with `$shortcode`.
33:      *
34:      * @param string $shortcode
35:      *
36:      * @return Response
37:      *
38:      * @link https://www.instagram.com/developer/endpoints/media/#get_media_by_shortcode
39:      */
40:     public function getByShortcode($shortcode)
41:     {
42:         return $this->client->request('GET', "media/shortcode/$shortcode");
43:     }
44: 
45:     /**
46:      * Searches for recent media in a given area with `$latitude` and $longitude`.
47:      * Optionally, `$minTimestamp`, $maxTimestamp` and `$distance` can also be
48:      * provided to limit the search.
49:      *
50:      * @param int $latitude   Latitude of the center search coordinate. If used, lng is required
51:      * @param int $longitude  Longitude of the center search coordinate. If used, lat is required
52:      * @param int $distance   The distance in metres. Default is 1000m (distance=1000), max distance is 5km.
53:      *
54:      * @return Response
55:      *
56:      * @link https://www.instagram.com/developer/endpoints/media/#get_media_search
57:      */
58:     public function search($latitude, $longitude, $distance = 1000)
59:     {
60:         $params = ['query' => [
61:             'lat'      => $latitude,
62:             'lng'      => $longitude,
63:             'distance' => $distance,
64:         ]];
65: 
66:         return $this->client->request('GET', 'media/search', $params);
67:     }
68: }
